ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] KOS?
ygData.msgSnippet: Or you can ask if anyone is killing the dragoons and ask them to pull the dragoons and golems away from that spot. :-) do golems have faction? Oh,and can the
ygData.messageBody:
Or you can ask if anyone is killing the dragoons and ask them to pull the
dragoons and golems away from that spot. :-)
do golems have faction?
Oh,and can the golems and dragoons see thru invis?
luv,
-Su

> To the guards, dragoons, golems, undead and a few others I am sure I am
> missing, yes. Other than that have fun. If you are headed to Lavastorm
just
> follow the left wall from Commons and you should not run into anything but
> maybe a golem or guards/dragoons at the very last corner before you zone.
> With SoW you shouldnt have a problem zoning before you are all chopped to
> bits.
>
> Mu
>
